cbinstall.name: CB Connect
cbinstall.author: Krileon
cbinstall.copyright: (C) 2004-2017 www.joomlapolis.com / Lightning MultiCom SA - and its licensors, all rights reserved
cbinstall.description: Facebook, Twitter, Google, LinkedIn, Windows Live, Instagram, Foursquare, GitHub, VKontakte, Steam, Reddit, Twitch, Stack Exchange, Pinterest, Amazon, Yahoo, PayPal, Disqus, WordPress, Meetup, Flickr, Vimeo, LINE, Spotify, and SoundCloud integration to Community Builder.

param.name: connect_link
param.label: Linking
param.description: Enable or disable account linking in profile edit. Note linking for the provider must also be enabled.

param.name: facebook_enabled
param.label: Enabled
param.description: Enable or disable this provider. This allows quick enable or disable without having to clear parameters.

param.name: facebook_application_id
param.label: App ID
param.description: Input application id or application key.

param.name: facebook_application_secret
param.label: App Secret
param.description: Input application secret.

param.name: facebook_permissions
param.label: Permissions
param.description: Optionally select additional permissions to request. Note the necessary permissions for login and registration are already requested. Do not request additional permissions unless absolutely needed.

param.name: facebook_callback
param.label: Callback URL
param.description: The provider callback url. This url should be supplied to the provider configuration as needed. This is sometimes also known as the redirect url. Note not all applications require this and may only require the domain.

param.name: facebook_debug
param.label: Debug
param.description: Enable or disable debugging of this provider. This will output a var_dump of provider http request responses (during authentication and API calls).

param.name: facebook_register
param.label: Register
param.description: Enable or disable account registration. Register allows for non-existing Community Builder users to register with their provider account credentials.

param.name: facebook_reg_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how registration button is displayed.

param.name: facebook_mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select if users should be registered immediately with Single Sign-on or if standard CB registration form should be pre-filled with their social site profile data. Note for pre-filled mode this provider field should be set to display on registration.

param.name: facebook_username
param.label: Username Format
param.description: Optionally input substitution supported username format override.

param.name: facebook_username_substitutions
param.label: Username Substitutions
param.description: The additional supported substitutions for username format.

param.name: facebook_usergroup
param.label: Usergroups
param.description: Optionally select registration usergroups of users.

param.name: facebook_approve
param.label: Approval
param.description: Select registration to require admin approval.

param.name: facebook_confirm
param.label: Confirmation
param.description: Select registration to require email confirmation.

param.name: facebook_avatar_approve
param.label: Avatar Approval
param.description: Select avatar to require admin approval.

param.name: facebook_canvas_approve
param.label: Canvas Approval
param.description: Select canvas to require admin approval.

param.name: from
param.label: From Field
param.description: Select a field to synchronize from on registration. Note field value format is not guaranteed and may require additional permissions. Values are provided as is.

param.name: to
param.label: To Field
param.description: Select a field to synchronize to on registration. Note the core username, name, first name, middle name, last name, avatar, canvas, and email are already synchronized.

param.name: facebook_link
param.label: Linking
param.description: Enable or disable account linking. Linking allows existing Community Builder users while logged in to link their provider account to their existing Community Builder account.

param.name: facebook_link_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how the link button is displayed.

param.name: facebook_link_resynchronize
param.label: Resynchronize
param.description: Enable or disable resynchronizing of provider profile data on link.

param.name: facebook_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how the login button is displayed.

param.name: facebook_firstlogin
param.label: First Redirect
param.description: Input optional first time login redirect URL (e.g. index.php?option=com_comprofiler).

param.name: facebook_login
param.label: Redirect
param.description: Input optional login redirect URL (e.g. index.php?option=com_comprofiler).

param.name: facebook_login_resynchronize
param.label: Resynchronize
param.description: Enable or disable resynchronizing of provider profile data on every successful login.

param.description: The additional supported substitutions for username format.

param.name: spotify_usergroup
param.label: Usergroups
param.description: Optionally select registration usergroups of users.

param.name: spotify_approve
param.label: Approval
param.description: Select registration to require admin approval.

param.name: spotify_confirm
param.label: Confirmation
param.description: Select registration to require email confirmation.

param.name: spotify_avatar_approve
param.label: Avatar Approval
param.description: Select avatar to require admin approval.

param.name: spotify_canvas_approve
param.label: Canvas Approval
param.description: Select canvas to require admin approval.

param.name: from
param.label: From Field
param.description: Select a field to synchronize from on registration. Note field value format is not guaranteed and may require additional permissions. Values are provided as is.

param.name: to
param.label: To Field
param.description: Select a field to synchronize to on registration. Note the core username, name, first name, middle name, last name, avatar, canvas, and email are already synchronized.

param.name: spotify_link
param.label: Linking
param.description: Enable or disable account linking. Linking allows existing Community Builder users while logged in to link their provider account to their existing Community Builder account.

param.name: spotify_link_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how the link button is displayed.

param.name: spotify_link_resynchronize
param.label: Resynchronize
param.description: Enable or disable resynchronizing of provider profile data on link.

param.name: spotify_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how the login button is displayed.

param.name: spotify_firstlogin
param.label: First Redirect
param.description: Input optional first time login redirect URL (e.g. index.php?option=com_comprofiler).

param.name: spotify_login
param.label: Redirect
param.description: Input optional login redirect URL (e.g. index.php?option=com_comprofiler).

param.name: spotify_login_resynchronize
param.label: Resynchronize
param.description: Enable or disable resynchronizing of provider profile data on every successful login.

param.name: soundcloud_enabled
param.label: Enabled
param.description: Enable or disable this provider. This allows quick enable or disable without having to clear parameters.

param.name: soundcloud_client_id
param.label: Client ID
param.description: Input application client id.

param.name: soundcloud_client_secret
param.label: Client Secret
param.description: Input application client secret.

param.name: soundcloud_callback
param.label: Callback URL
param.description: The provider callback url. This url should be supplied to the provider configuration as needed. This is sometimes also known as the redirect url. Note not all applications require this and may only require the domain.

param.name: soundcloud_debug
param.label: Debug
param.description: Enable or disable debugging of this provider. This will output a var_dump of provider http request responses (during authentication and API calls).

param.name: soundcloud_register
param.label: Register
param.description: Enable or disable account registration. Register allows for non-existing Community Builder users to register with their provider account credentials.

param.name: soundcloud_reg_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how the registration button is displayed.

param.name: soundcloud_mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select if users should be registered immediately with Single Sign-on or if standard CB registration form should be pre-filled with their social site profile data. Note for pre-filled mode this provider field should be set to display on registration.

param.name: soundcloud_username
param.label: Username Format
param.description: Optionally input substitution supported username format override.

param.name: soundcloud_username_substitutions
param.label: Username Substitutions
param.description: The additional supported substitutions for username format.

param.label: Usergroups
